questions.question: Choose the correct form: La casa _____ (blanco)
questions.explanation: Casa is feminine singular, so the adjective becomes 'blanca'.

questions.question: Select: Los gatos _____ (negro)
questions.explanation: Gatos is masculine plural, so the adjective becomes 'negros'.

questions.question: Complete: Las flores _____ (bonito)
questions.explanation: Flores is feminine plural, so the adjective becomes 'bonitas'.

questions.question: Choose: El libro _____ (interesante)
questions.explanation: Adjectives ending in -e don't change for gender. Libro is singular, so 'interesante'.

questions.question: Select: Una mesa _____ (grande)
questions.explanation: Adjectives ending in -e don't change for gender, only number. Mesa is singular.

questions.question: Complete: Los estudiantes _____ (inteligente)
questions.explanation: Estudiantes is plural. Adjectives ending in -e add -s for plural.
